dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where each document is represented as a node and edges represent citations between them. The dataset is used for semi-supervised classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan GÂ¨unnemann
dcterms:description: Cora-ML is an enhanced version of the Cora dataset, designed for machine learning tasks with additional features and a different structure.
dcterms:title: Cora-ML

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset similar to Cora, where documents are represented as nodes and citations as edges, used for semi-supervised classification.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Pubmed is a citation network dataset that consists of scientific publications from the PubMed database, used for semi-supervised classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Pubmed
